tool_description: Data about Cigar brands, Cigars, and country data
name: Cigars
title: Cigars

api_list.name: Get Brand by ID
api_list.description: Grab a Brand by it's Database ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cigars.p.rapidapi.com/brands/15644"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cigars.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cigars.p.rapidapi.com/brands/{brandid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cigars.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
